transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Namaste.
Customer: Haan ji sir. Main aapko call kar raha tha sir baat hi nahi ho pa rahi thi whatsapp pe. Karna kya kya sir aap phir kya karoge call karke phir kya hota hai?
Customer: Haan ji?
Customer: Sir aapka kaam kaam hum logo se hota nahi hai. Kya karna hai?
Executive: Sir usi cheez ke liye call kar raha hu na sir hum log aapko.
Executive: Humne na sir aapko ek email id bheji hui hai care@jio.com. Haan.
Executive: Right? Aur niche email ka content bheja hua hai. Haan.
Executive: Yeh please ek bari Jio wale ke aap mail kar denge apni mail id se. Haan thik hai matlab aapne apna kaam khatam kar diya toh hum humare kandho pe daal diya. Nahi sir nahi kar rahe hai khatam sir aapke. Toh aap karo na hum hume kya karna hai. Sir yeh aapke number pe dikkat aa rahi hai aapke network pe dikkat aa rahi hai toh karna toh aapko hi padega na hum log bhi. Yaar kya bol rahe ho jab jab pichle pichle paanch saal se chal raha hai toh abhi kaise problem aa sakti hai? Kya aap log bol rahe ho?
Executive: Toh sir ek baat bataye problem agar app mein hota toh Airtel pe bhi nahi chal raha hota na sir. Same hi phone hai same hi cheeze hai aisa toh nahi hai ki humne kuch badal diya usme. Sirf network badalne se aapka woh chal raha hai na aapki seller chal rahi hai na aapka IndiaMART chal raha na. Woh aap dekho na aap karo na unko kaam ki humara app kyun nahi chal raha hai.
Executive: Toh sir agar hum dono thik hai agar mere phone mein mere phone mein problem hoti na meri baat suno agar mere phone mein problem hoti main maan leta lekin do phone chal rahe hai dono pe teen teen phone chal rahe hai teenon pe yeh problem hai humare app mein. Toh sir baat phone ki nahi hai na baat Jio ke network ki hai baat aapke phone ki nahi hai. Par sir aap saath nahi doge hum bhi toh aapko call kar rahe hai toh hum toh aapke solution ke liye hi koshish kar rahe hai na sir.
Customer: Nahi main matlab aapka meet ho gaya har bari aap humhi pe chilla doge toh hum kaise kaam kare bataye. Nahi meri baat sunna na aap mujhe bol rahe ho na ki aap mail karo toh toh jab aap se nahi ho pa raha hai toh hum humara kaise manenge woh. Sir humare ko team ne bola ki aap customer ko yeh bolo ki ek baar woh apne mobile se phone matlab mail kare care@jio.com pe hum nahi kar sakte kyunki aapke mobile pe dikkat aa rahi hai. Meanwhile humari bhi Jio ke saath mein discussion chal rahi hogi toh hum bhi usko solve karne mein lage hue hai lekin ek temporary solution ke liye aap bhi ek baar ko kare na ki sir mere ko isme simple sa yeh hai ki main aapke network se yeh wala jo application hai aur uski IP yeh hai hum usko track nahi kar pa rahe hai hum usko run nahi kar pa rahe hai. Simple sa aap bhi ek baar Jio ko kare na aap Airtel aur VI mein chala rahe hai Jio mein aapka nahi chal raha hai ek bari aap apne Jio ko abhi apne side se Jio ko ek bari aap mail toh kare. Thik hai main karta hu. Dikkat ho gayi hai toh dono ko milke hi kaam karna padega na. Main karta hu phir yeh yeh yeh jo aap bol rahe hai yeh discussion sara toh yeh sara discussion in vain hai yeh kuch nahi hoga isse. Aap aap mein se. Main karta hu main karta hu aap jo ho tension mat lijiye. Ek minute sunne toh sahi sunne toh sahi. Main screenshot bhejta hu aapko. Haan haan. Aap ek bari baat bataye aapko aap se sunna mere ko achcha lagta hai kya? Nahi yaar mujhe aapka kaam karwa nahi raha hu aur main baar baar sun raha hu aap se.
Customer: Batao sir aap. Nahi ab kya karna aap mujhe bata do karna kya hai. Karna kuch nahi hai aap isko mail kijiye sir dekhiye aap bhi thoda sa patience rakhiye hum bhi rakhe hue hai we are aapki utmost priority. Are kya bol rahe ho aap patient patient patient kya pichle 10 din se app nahi chal rahi aap mujhe abhi bhi bol rahe ho patient rakho. Kya patient rakhunga main 10 din 10 din ke liye. Thik hai technical issue aata hai do din ke ek din ke liye do ghante ke liye. Pichle 10 din se nahi chal raha hai aap mujhe wohi kahani phir se suna rahe ho. Sir ek bari aap yeh mail karke mujhe screenshot bhejo. Please. Nahi apna apna bhi koi mail id bhejo na. Jisme bhi aap aapko CC mein rakhunga. Ab main apni mail id bhej deta hu aapko. Haan woh bhi uske bhi main CC mein rakhunga. Thik hai koi problem nahi hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's IndiaMART app is not working.

- Customer is unable to use the app.

- Customer is frustrated with the issue.



Resolution:

- Executive asked customer to mail Jio support.

- Executive shared his email ID with the customer.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will mail Jio support.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- app issue, jio network, technical issue, email
